channel.title: Client Type?
channel.description: Hi. I'm making a server and like I want to know how I find out what client type my client is... I want to add it onto a webclient maker like RSWebclients and they ask for client type but I don't know how to find it out. I downloaded PkPlanet by Bashar but I'm not sure what client type it is... If you need the link to where i downloaded it here http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,433417.0.html Please help thank you!

item.title: Client Type?
